name: 10 second worries
description:
An AI wakes you from your cryogenic slumber to help fix a multitude of problems with your space ship. How long can you keep your ship afloat in the chaotic point and click survival game?

Credits:

Bryan Huke: Programmer, Developer, Game Design

Jarrett Workman: Game Design, Creative designer, Dialogue writing, voice acting

Sam Curtice: Composer,  Manual nonsense writing

Madisen Ingalls: Artist

Grigori_Lord: Dialogue writing

Max Queen: Manual nonsense writing

Sound effects from https://opengameart.org/
